name: MHTOCSMMConditionAcuteRespiratoryDistress
title: MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Acute Respiratory Distress
description: The MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Acute Renal Respiratory Distress is derived from the MH TOC Severe Maternal Morbidity Condition Profile. This derived profile specifies an individual SMM indicator code by binding to an extension, ValueSet, and CodeSystem. /n There are ten ICD-10 codes specified for Acute Renal Failure in this profile: J80, J95.1, J95.2, J95.3, J95.82x, J96.0x, J96.2x, J96.9x, R06.03, R09.2
